page.title: 06TRAFFIC COUNT IN GOYTRE
page.content: The main road which passes through the village of {GOYTRE}is the{ {A4042}.The road runs from Newport,via the outskirts of Pontypool to Abergavenny. {Class 4}from Goytre school(8-10 year olds) chose to monitor the traffic on a Tuesday,which is a market day in Abergavenny.A comparison was made between the volume of traffic on a Bank Holiday as opposed to an ordinary workday. Whitsun Bank Holiday Tuesday, May 28th, and Tuesday,July 2nd,were chosen as appropriate dates.The count lasted from 10a.m. to 11a.m. on each occasion and details were taken of the number of vehicles and their different types. Twelve children were involved,who later displayed the data collected on {column and pie graphs.
